templates.title: Nginx Proxy Manager
templates.description: Nginx Proxy Manager enables you to easily forward to your websites running at home or otherwise, including free SSL.
templates.name: nginx-proxy-manager

templates.title: Cloudflare DDNS
templates.description: Cloudflare DDNS allows you to use the free Cloudflare DNS Service as a Dynamic DNS Provider.
templates.name: cloudflare-ddns

env.name: ZONE
env.label: Zone
env.description: The DNS zone that DDNS updates should be applied to.

env.name: SUBDOMAIN
env.label: Subdomain
env.description: A subdomain of the ZONE to write DNS changes to. If this is not supplied the root zone will be used.

templates.name: wireguard

env.name: SERVERURL
env.label: Server URL
env.description: External IP or domain name for docker host.

env.name: PEERS
env.label: Peers
env.description: Number (or alphanumeric names list) of peers to create confs for. Required for server mode.

env.name: INTERNAL_SUBNET
env.label: Internal Subnet
env.description: Internal subnet for the wireguard and server and peers.

env.name: ALLOWEDIPS
env.label: Allowed IPs
env.description: The IPs/Ranges that the peers will be able to reach using the VPN connection.
